message.body: What you up to Martha "these colors don't run" Stuckey?
What's that nickname about? I'm at megs still but were going to head back to the fireworks sometime
I'm giving everyone patriotic nicknames today! I'll see you at the fireworks hopefully
Where are you going to be? Who are you going with? And how was that patriotic?
I dunno who or where or when. And I can't believe you don't know that slogan. It can be found on bumper stickers and cutoff t shirts throughout this great land
What time are the fireworks? My roomies are having a partay so I might roll in late
I have no idea actually...
Well we're heading up there now
You seeing this!!! We're outside the aster
Aaaand now at the soap factory
Fail Martha! I thought you'd be all over this cultural event
You feeling up for hangin? Don't let me guilt you if you're not
Of course I am... I'm still downtown bc a friend was helping me with finance stuff... Stress. Anyway I'm just walking home now
Ahh the life of a working gal. You wanna make some din? Get some ice cream? Take in a cultural event? I'm feeling wiped but am up for just about anything
So crazy pants just got home. Maybe your place would be a nice change of pace? I'm not super super hungry either... You decide?
Aight well I'm getting some steak, potatoes, and green beans. If you prefer, you can just drink wine
Fancy! I would eat that. Where?
Caitlyn has strep but come on over
(01/02) Thanks for staying up to hash that out. Or at least try. I think it was really good until I started to fade. Whatever we figure out, I am glad to know t
(02/02) hat it is such a thoughtful decision. And for a woman who has problems with restraint you really had me fooled! I'll take a lesson
That's why I had to kick you out at the end... I like you a lot Tim. Thanks for letting me be thoughtful and restraining at all.
Likewise mc. Hope you can clear your head a bit and sleep well
I think we should be more happy than cautious.
I think it's one or the other don't you?
Not both simultaneously?
Cautiously happy?
Well isn't that what we've been doing? I'm not cautious a about being happy
And by that I mean yes, you are absolutely right

I was just thinking that we were doing more worrying than we should have last night. But that's ok too. I dont want to get weighed down by it though. My boss just bought me a $12 lobster sandwich and I saw jd kuehl on the way home...
It sounds like that lobster sandwich will be weighing you down plenty, best not to have anything else doing it too. How's jd?
Luckily there was enough distance between us that I could pretend that I didn't see him. I can send your regards next time though.
Mmmm not necessary. I'm surprised he didn't try to hit on you
I think Facebook chat is his preferred medium
Oh really? Do you know this from experience?
Jealous?
Jealous of you, yes. Did you really eat 12 lobsters in a sandwich?
What else could I have meant? I mean have you met jd? And it was a 12 dollar sandwich not a 12 lobster sandwich...
Oh! You had me so excited about a 12 lobster sandwich. I guess yours is a bit classier
Hah. The $12 sandwich was big enough.
So you think I should call Katie or are we just leaving it at cautious happiness?
Regina is giving me a ride home then I'll call
Sorry I'm still at work for quite a while

Oh no worries. If you would call her under circumstance about what she might be expecting etc etc, yea then its not my place to say either way. But I think we shouldn't let on until we know more about what is going on, you know? Bc we wouldn't be asking for permission as much as informing her out of respect. And informing her right now is more to cover our asses than respecting her. That's my thought anyway. Have you had any brilliant ideas today?
Under any circumstance I mean
When are you done working?
Just got showered
Do you want some dinner?
I was thinking about having some of that tonight. When, where? I have to do a little project so maybe in an hour?
I just made something sort of Indian. It's ready when you are. (don't get used to this).
Haha ok! Can it wait an hour or are you hungry?
No I'll wait... Little project...?
Cool. I'll tell you bout it over dinner
Should I bring anything? Vino?
Yea if you feel like it. I have some but who knows how much will be left in an hour...
Such a tease.
Who me?
I still don't know what's going on in your head. And I did come back!
Im kidding and I was in the shower and im sorry I missed you. I would've kissed you back. Don't text and drive also.
Done driving! Aren't we just two proactive folks or what. I'll come back over right now
Ok maybe that's unreasonable but i honestly would. Just give me a little sign next time, other than falling asleep. You driving me crazy in a good way marth
Sorry!! Oh god I am tragic. I'm good for nothing after beer and cheese curds.
I think they did me in too, at least ruined my ability to act on my impulses. I really want to go to the walker tonight if you wanna join. Free!
Im seeing Caro again tonight I think... I also have to write up cover letters and what not for a couple jobs. I really want to though.
Hokay well if you change your mind lemme know. Probs gonna go around 7
Mmk. Hows the office?
(01/02) Oh man it has been such a good day. Just talked all morning with the boss and he got me really excited about seeing some art. And he's buying me Lebanes
(02/02) e food! How are reg and Carol?
Reg disappeared for a long time... Carol just schooled me on the street map of downtown while I was trying to answer her question about the farmers market on 'Nicollet mall road'
Haha! What a crazy. I'd love to get a few lessons on urban life from her.
Also, I think you should seriously reconsider your plans for this evening. You can see Carolyn any time ... how often do we get to spend quality time together?
Timothy. You know I would if Caro wasn't here.
Ya ya ya well we should go some day when you don't have social obligations ...
Well of course.
You should've heard Regina on the ride home...
She was telling me things that make her throw up. One is semen. She had stories.
Wow you guys must be getting pretty close. I can't wait to hear ...
Also I didn't realize how close you live to my work. Just drove by
And you didn't stop by?
I thought you were with Carolyn!
I am, shes here!
Well next time I will. Don't you need some alone time with your friend from afar?
Yes we do need that. Also, she wants to be abandon me for Caitlyn. What are you folks doing later?
Currently just porch sitting. Caitlyn says she might be down for hanging. Or there's always the walker...
How's high art, member of the elite?
Actually very cool. Despite not understanding it at all it definitely moved me. But I've been fulfilled and am back to porching. How are the ladies?
We're singing. You should get us drunk bc were fun when were drunk.
Where are you singing? And how could I go about getting you drunk/fun?
We were at a church with a friend. We may go out? Were on the move
Well that sounds like fun. I wish I had some booze to offer but fresh out. If you find yourselves in uptown call me!
Hey that's a bummer you're aching. Hope you're feeling more like your vivacious self soon
Yea, I didn't say bc Caro asked and I lied but I have a fever too. maybe I'll get a day off tomorrow?
You didn't say wha? Nevermind, just get better! Take a day off, you've been going out late every night. Sleep is so good
I didn't tell you I had a fever. Maybe I will.
Well goodnight my sickly friend. Let me know if I can do anything for you.
Hey dude I'm going to be gone until Tuesday so you're not really going to sleep tonight right?
Of course not! But you're not leaving tonight are you?
Feeling any better?
No im leaving first thing tomorrow morn. I'm super excited.I'm feeling much better actually. Where are you working today? June street?
(01/02) That's wonderful on all counts! I'm not at June but can't believe you remember that ... actually somewhere in golden valley where I get no service. Any
(02/02) good stories from reg today?
If I have a child and shes a lady I want to name her June. Thats why I remembered. No she's been quiet. But just busted out the doritos and salsa.
Aww yeah must be Friday afternoon! What's your plan for the eve? Partying hard?
Well jacks making dinner for Caro and I and then there's a party I guess. I dont know how into the party idea I am.
That sounds nice. Well if you're receptive to other entertainment I'll try to cook something up. I'd just really like to see you at some point
Sorry. Work got bonkers and then I forgot my keys and key card to get back into the office etc etc. Crazy. In any case I want to see you too. I'll text you after dinner?
Ha! You mean to tell me you don't always have it all together all the time? I refuse to believe it. Gimme a call when you're free or if you make some plans
I'm not reading into that. Will do.
What's up Mattie? Did Jack get you drunk? Say hey to that boy for me.
He says hey back. We're about to bike to uptown. Want to come to a party? I don't know how long I'll stay but maybe for a bit?
It's at blaisdell an 35th. It's gonna be a big party......
(01/02) I wish I could explain how I'm feeling right now, somewhere between excitement and gratitude and happiness and exhaustion. And wishing you weren't leav
(02/02) ing quite yet. For the record: that was not a high five. It was a "come closer and forget about holding up that bedsheet" ten
I'm cool with a high five. Take naps and enjoy your weekend :)
(01/02) OK well I'll try not to read into that... hope you can relax and let me know what you find out about dollywood. It seemed like mecca to all those backwo
(02/02) ods Kentuckians
How's that lake sunset?
(01/02) Ok I promise no more text bombarding while you're on vacay but I've had lots of thinking time today and any lingering apprehension be dammed. I really l
(02/02) ike being with you.
You can bombard, it's not a zen retreat. I like being with and hearing from you too. Thanks for saying so.
Pretty gorgeous. Have to enjoy it now though bc I guess it's supposed to be stormy the rest of the time...
(01/02) Boo! Well I'll send my sunshine vibes your way. Otherwise it's not the worst thing to hunker down with Dolly and enjoy a summer storm. Did you bring you
(02/02) r geetar for a Stuckey fam jam?
I did actually. I'm writing that cover letter though so pat can get me into C hall. Musicking will have to wait until tomorrow.
(01/02) To whom it may concern: I am writing to inform you of your interest in the next big thing in admin assistance/impromptu moments of musical genius : me.
(02/02) I'll begin next Monday at 9. Sincerely, m.c.s. done
that's all you think I'm good for??
Marth I have much more but that's all you get for free. Also I can only bang out so much text while I'm on the highway ...
Fucking knock it off Campbell!
Maybe throw in "a smile that could charm the pants off the Pope "
Ok ok
Stop texting and driving. I like you alive.
I promise to no longer text and drive. Happy Sunday! Since you declined on going to the walker I'm taking my little bro instead. It's going to be tres romantic
That's a good sobertivity. You could also bowl at Bryant lake? That's a bar though I suppose.
Oh good word! I think we're gonna go to Calhoun. Is
it nice there today? It's beautiful here
It is! It's hot actually. But no clouds at all.
Well you're welcome for sending the sunshine your way. Reeled in any big ones?
My grandparents are law abiding folk so no fishing for any of us unlicenseds
Of course. Sounds like a perfect opportunity for some of your classic political subversion.
Got into a debate about the budget with nana at dinner
Did you find some north woods inspiration and write a few songs today? I'm fatiguing of family time ...
No songs but it is inspiring. The storms are over and left the craziest sunset. It was out of control. What are you and Brian doing?
Man, that sounds beautiful! It just started to storm here and it feels so good. We're watching jackass 3, so I got my high art and low brow all in one day
Balance is healthy. Sounds like fun!
Hmmm yeah not my first choice but bonding nonetheless. Also found out that my dad went to the e.r. which really worried Brian and put a damper on the day
What happened? Is he ok?
(01/02) Yeah he's alright. Another person in the church got killed in a car accident and I think my dad just fainted from stress or something. I dunno, it was w
(02/02) eird, he's had a hell of a week.
No kidding. Are you ok?
Keep it on the dl though I think he doesn't want it to be a big deal
Holy shit we are having a STORM!
I will don't worry. Stay safe and don't make fun for saying so
Yeah I just have a new appreciation for how emotionally draining that is. I'm a bit worried about the old man
I hear you loud and clear. I won't get any crazy ideas from the movie...
Yea you know one guy from jackass died recently from drunk driving
Yeah I know, they're not the greatest role models. I'll stick with beaver cleaver
I meant stay safe with the storm though originally. Off to bed. Big day tomorrow! Lumberjack breakfast and a big bike ride.
(01/02) Nice! I don't know what a lumberjack breakfast is but if it's anything like a big boy breakfast I like the sound of it. Have a fun bikeride and sleep w
(02/02) ell. I'd like to be sleeping well with you. And eating lumberjack breakfasts.
Night Stuckey
I got some incense for us to enjoy today. Excitedd??
Yes! Excited with two D's. Seriously, I really like that stuff, it relaxes me so much. Did you go shopping in all the kitsch boutiques on your bike ride?
Nobody would go on the ride with me! But it was kitchy where we drove.
Weeeak. You should go on your own. Or at least find somewhere to be by yourself and your thoughts. That place is so good for that
I have done that a little. Its hard to get away from Tyler...
Yes I know how difficult it is for you to pry yourself from the love of your life. Tell him you're going off to find your spirit animal
He's driving me bonkers actually. My mom just drilled me about your program in Austin. They're onto us.
Oh shit! Panic! Did you tell her you had no idea about anything going on in my life?
Also, my bro asked if there was anything going on with us. I think they're definitely on to us. But how?
No I told her. Now my grandma. Yikes. What'd you tell him?
(01/02) Neither confirmed or denied. Craftily averted. Your Grandma? In deep. And you have how many more days with them? I suspect by the time you get back your
(02/02) entire extended family will know every little detail down to my lackluster bedroom performance. Can't you talk about politics or something
Covered politics last night unfortunately... No I'm just answering like it ain't no thang. Throw them off the scent. Might tell them I'm a lesbian.
Yes! I think you should. You can tell them I'm gay too if it's necessary
If they think were dating then they've already assumed you're gay.
Ouch. I don't know whose ego should be more hurt. Is that really your track record?
No not really. Just a few. My dads feeding my dogs marshmallows by wetting them in his mouth first and handing them off.
And hey, if you are the experimental type that's cool just tell me
I don't know how you'd mean given the context...?
That's really sweet in a carnal kind of way. I'd like someone to do that to me
I'm just messing. I'm saying if you like sleeping with gay guys or women that doesn't bother me
I don't know what I'm saying. I think this text convo took an unintended turn
Let's just leave it at I like who you are
Hey i respect the offer no need to rescind. But i only sleep with gay guys by accident.
And I know very little about any relationships you've been in but that doesn't really make any difference to me
I like to talk about myself so it's not bc I have anything to hide that you don't know it
Haha I know. Although I think you've got some good stories I haven't heard. You're just saving them up for your Dolly -esque memoirs aren't you?
I'll try them out on you if you're curious. Or if you're not
Also I do want to go camping and have never been
Heck yeah, to stories and camping! I've got all the gear. When,where, who? I'm there.
Whenever! Whoever! Ive never been to Duluth either
Well dang it's pretty beautiful up there. Have any plans for, say, next weekend? Although you might be cabined out
It's a possibility. I'm supposed to have a rehearsal on Saturday but fuck that and the fleet foxes concert Sunday night.
Well maybe not
What are you rehearsing for? And do you really have tix?
With the band! And yea I keep forgetting but my mom got me tickets when I was in Spain. My bro and I are going
Dang that's awesome. Shannon is too good to you. Well keep camping on the back burner. What are you guys up to today?
Just finished a ten-er. Now were antique ing in our destination.
Nice. Put a bird on it! And by tenner do you mean ten mile run?
Bike. I was pretty proud of my usage.
Not bad Stuckey. Exhausted?
I'm pretty tired but I also haven't been sleeping too well. And I have to bike back!
Well you'll sleep well tonight. That's an impressive day's work. You coming home tomorrow?
Tonight actually. What are you up to?
I think I'll be working late and maybe going to a bbq if I'm not too exhausted. I'd love to hang but if you're wiped out I understand
Yea, I'll be getting back at around 9 I think. I'll let you know :)
Cool well have a relaxing rest of the trip. Take it all in, even the fam
Just leaving now. Such sad at goodbyes... But it should be like 3 hours or so. Still working?
I hear you, not my forte either. Just got home and enjoyed the best part of my day where I take off my pants. Not gonna bbq so I'm free if you are...
What the hay Marth? Phone die?
I'm downtown. Coffee break? Reg can come too ...
Hah. She probably won't come but I can come see you for a few. Where are you at?
In!
I'm on the skyway level by Broadway pizza
I didn't even ask how your interview went!
(01/02) I noticed! It was good, I'll tell you bout it tonight. I'm gonna be done real early so am down with whenever. We could even go swimming ... just gimme a
(02/02) call when you want to hang
Heyo. I'm back home now. What do you think?
(01/02) Wait weren't YOU supposed to tell me what you wanted to do? As usual work is going later than planned should be home by five. I have stuff for tacos if
(02/02) you want to come to my place
When did I have to decide?? I'm not super hungry right this second but will be later Im sure. Now you go.
Very helpful. So you've offered that you don't want to eat dinner at 5 pm. Good. Want to go to the lake for a while? Also you should pick a movie
Hah I'm sorry. Im a little tuckered out and uncreative. Lake it is. Or cards? I hate cards but I'm in the mood. Or bananagrams.
Should I leave now to avoid traffic?
Cool I can teach you cribbage if you want. Bring bananahrams too. I'll let you know when I leave here and you should leave then
Or are you done?
That was a lovely evening Martha. The naan was delicious and I am still thrilled that we are hanging at all. Sleep well
Hey, keep next thursday free so you can come see this play with me. Ill pay for your ticket. Cool?
Very cool. What's the play?
People from Olaf started a theatre company. Megan being one of them. It's called love song I think?
Sounds like my kind of play. Hopefully they somehow incorporate the wells Fargo wagon
(01/02) You have any interest in the walker tonight? It's free and all my friends are leaving so I have nobody to go with... if you want some Marth or some Meg
(02/02) time that's cool I just really wanna go again, with an artsy companion
That sounds like a plan. I'm meeting a friend for some musicking for a while but I can go after? how late does it go?
(01/02) I think it's open til 9? I don't necessarily want to stay for a long time, maybe an hour or so. But definitely do your music thing for however long the
(02/02) spirit moves ya
I'll let you know. I have to run some errands too. But either way ill see where youre at
No and I think you should go steady with her.
Because I came across her on cougarlife and I'm not sure...
Well I trust your judgement. She lists her interests as "meditative eating, snow angels, and gluing things". So right up my alley
She didn't list dogs? She's reallllllly into dogs. Match made in heaven.
That's true! She did say that she was interested in "housebreaking a dirty dog". I think she's weird.
Yea not a euphemism
I'm worried I may not make it to the walker... Sorry in advance if not. But I still want to see you after if you want.
No worries and absolutely I wanna see you. The deal is you have to sing me your songs cuz I have to get my art fix somewhere
Ok I'll rap on the window
Moonshine!
Last night was really wonderful. You can wake up at 630 and drive me to work any day you like. :)
Do you work today?
(01/02) You know I appreciate those words Marth and I had a wonderful time too. Who knew talking could feel so good. And I think I could get used to six am if i
(02/02) t means waking up like that.
Yeah we're in the studio today. Rain's got me in a funk
It is gross and supposed to stay gross for a while. In the 100s next week.
So I hear. I'm gonna be nasty. Suddenly my cabin sounds like a great idea...
Also when's camping? The parks are gonna be open
Youre getting out of town? Who knows for camping. August? I have a family reunion the first weekend. We'll have to compare calendars.
Well maybe next weekend I'm going to the cabin, we'll see. But I really do want to camp at some point
We'll find a time. The sky has been so weird today. But hey I get done early.
I know shits freakin me out! What time are you done? And are you making plans with Meg?
She hasn't said anything so I don't know what she's thinking exactly. I'm done at 330.
(01/03) Well my plans involve definitely seeing you, maybe getting inappropriately intoxicated, saying some foolish and offensive things, apologizing, making ou
(02/03) t quite a bit, possibly seeing some music or a movie, finding myself at a houseparty, skinny dipping in lake Calhoun and eating something greasy and del
(03/03) icious. Not necessarily in that order. Or at all.
Oh man I already skinny dipped today. Everything else though.
You have quite the sense of humor Stuckey. Sar cas m. I bet you've never even been skinny dipping
I think I have... I've definitely done other things naked
Do you have the house all to yourself this weekend?
Well duh but skinny dipping is better than all the rest
Yes! All by my lonesome
Naked soccer is pretty fun.
(01/02) Aight I could buy that. But it seems like you're left pretty vulnerable. I've taken some stingers to the midsection and that hurt with clothes on. So I'
(02/02) m sticking with skinny dipping. Also, when have you ever played soccer? I would kill to watch that
Why??
Is this the beginning of the inappropriate and offensive remarks?
When do you work until?
Almost doneeee god I want weekend so vaf
Finish up and come over. Don't your bosses know who I am?
Actually I told them all about you today so now they do. I have to take Sammie home in uptown so maybe an hour?
Did you really? Would it be better if I met you at colfax?
If you're cool with that that would be lovely but I'm fine coming over there.
It doesnt matter either way, but you driving that much is crazy... Let me know when I should leave
Nowish!
How's the presentation?
Mmmm I got a little distracted by a crossword. Doing some now. Whatchu up to?
I just got home. Did you finish it?
Nah but I didn't expect to. What's your fancy for the eve?
The Dakota has an outdoor jazz fest if you're up for that. Otherwise I'm thinking of baking some mac and cheese. That's where my head's at
Nothing specific... Should I come over? Or are you working on stuff now?
Come on over in 30 maybe?
Ok, but let me know if you need more time
Hey if you haven't left yet can you bring some bread crumbs
We're racing right?
Quit texting!
Likewise!
Hey I just didn't want to make ty uncomfortable and you caught me by surprise. But that was sweet. Enjoy those helplessness blues
Like clockwork. Don't worry. It's kind of you to think about it. Thanks for hanging and for the ride :)
I secured today's crossword. No need to do something crazy and bike around town for it.
(01/02) Good work! Did you start it already? I'm working at the studio alone today so if you want I could swing by when I'm done and we could knock that sucker
(02/02) out in no time. Also I was so out of it last night. The a.c. here makes me realize that my brain was only half working all weekend
I hear that. Yea, but let's do it somewhere cool. The heats making me loose it.
Dont loose it! "Take me to the river" by the talking heads or "gimme shelter" by the stones? I live my life and make my decisions through a series of lyrics
LOSE it. Sorry. What decision are you making with those songs?
Keep cool by seeking a.c. (stones) or dropping into some water (heads)
Ohhh outside vs inside. I vote shelter at some point. Where do you drop into water?
Word. Calhoun or cedar or Harriet are nice. But a.c. is too.
Also, do I dare mention the thing (or person) you don't want me to?
Sofie?
That bad, huh?
(01/02) Noooo. Well really I just want to hang with you. But I suppose I could get that Sofie thing outta the way. Or maybe I could wait til Wed when Harley get
(02/02) s back. I dunno. You think it would be good for you to join us?
I mean I'd rather that too, but she's sort of on your case. Why do you think it would be good if I came with?
(01/02) It would be good because I like being with you. I'm just going to tell her Wed. No pressure to hang today if you don't want to. I just don't want to fee
(02/02) l obligated to hang with sof

No no, I want to hang out anytime. I was just mentioning it i guess bc it would maybe look weird if you didn't? Ugh who knows. I don't want to be all calculating as such. Do whatever you think is best and I'll stay out of it.
Taken care of. Date on Wed. And I appreciate your opinion! Not a big deal at all. Hope you're staying cool
Yea, but it's your friendship with her and I want to respect that.
Yeah I know but also I wasn't even hanging out with her before you got here so don't feel responsible!
Mmk, just trying to be fair. :) so Travis wants to drink some wine around like 7? But can we still do crosswording for a little bit?
Yes! Of course. And I'm glad you're drinking with trav. I'll call you when I'm done
I'm going to sex world with Reg....
Hell yeah. I can't wait to hear about that. Gonna be done in a half hour
How's grilling?
So good marth. Steak and beer. How's the classy crowd?
They're good. Just leaving the restaurant and going to travs.
Okay well I've gotten myself a bit drunk but I think you should come over when you're done with trav
And we just did the thing where you smack your mouth to make a sound!
Oh my god. Im on my way.
Gooooooood
I was sort of joking, but I'll come over in a bit
Also, do you know any big burly gay men?
OK good one. Come whenever
In town I mean. And please just come out if you're gay and leave me alone.
Am I giving off a gay vibe? Once you out yourself as a lesbian.
You just said you were gay... Those kinds of gay vibes
Nine letter word for how I'm feeling right now. Begins with e and ends with d.
Exhausted. Here's the kicker though, you got an hour and a half more than me but im not complaining... Well worth it.
True but you're at least one and a half times more resilient than me! Got today's crossword?
Just secured it. Getting the receptionist trained to grab it for me.
Very nice. Taking advantage of your peons
I forgot why you said that you didn't have to present today
Because we got a really important order for some chairs so building those today. Ill send some pics
Whaaa? Pooties bday today?
Oh man, you're outside? Nice chair!
Oh yeah outside it's hawt. And you gotta believe me it will look nice! Is it really your mom's bday?
Yea it is. It'd be a weird joke if it wasn't. Will you send me a picture of the finished p?
Of course. Did you forget about her bday? Or get her anything?
I called her this morning... Didn't get her anything though... Maybe I'll send her a card? But yea I forgot that July 19 was coming up and that it is also her birthday on that day.
Rachel, the journalism major, sent me this text: "Can I put your fan going?"
Geez thoughtful daughter you are. Maybe you should at least send her a card! Did you tell rach she may can has that fans?
Holy hail! We're being stormed on
I'll see shannie this weekend. Where are you at? Minneapolis? Is it going to mess up my car?
Yeah up in st Anthony village. I don't know dude it's pretty crazy but your car should be ok
Is it not storming there?
Btw im g chatting with Sofie and I'm having a coniption fit. But yea it's really dark. The whole office is at my desk bc I have the most windows.
Haha nice. What kind of fit? The sirens going off! Sheet!
Be safe...
Always
Why are you having a coniption fit?
Shes talking about how you should come to the cabin and how I should ask you to car pool with me and she's moving to uptown and will be at your house a lot etc etc
When are you coming over to do the crossword today?
I don't understand ... explain later. Probably working later today but not sure
Looks like you guys have been working hard
Pretty nice! When do they become chairs?
Beautiful! Art! Do you ride those bikes after? Man, you should see how sweaty I am right now. Cleaning just made me so nasty. That tub probably wasn't cleaned for a fucking year.
